=What's coming next...=

==1) Support for multiple select menus ==

==3) Support for input type=file == 

The issue being that a native filedialog is opened which the extension does not have access to, which means silence for the user.  If a custom fileopen dialog could be introduced it might be possible for speech to be attached.  This could be something based around a signed applet using JFileChooser, or a JWS (jnlp.jar).
See http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/uiswing/components/filechooser.html.

==5) Overview function==

On loading the page a user will hear an "overview" of the page layout.
